ActJudges Act
SubjectEdith Anderson ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. N.R. Anderson **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to EDITH ANDERSON, survivor of the Hon. N.R. Anderson, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective November 10, 2014.
